> **crochet dishcloth series
** > ======================================= > this design is part of a larger collection of dishcloth patterns all of which feature a unique stitch pattern
> find out more here → ** ned & mimi crochet dishcloth series 1 ** **little waves washcloth** this washcloth and tea towel pattern is a quick and easy project for crocheters of all skill levels the pattern is written for 2 sizes - washcloth and tea towel - but also includes instructions for adjusting the stitch pattern to make a custom size the pattern also comes with a video tutorial **materials** yarn any weight 4/worsted weight yarn in a cotton or cotton blend in 3 colors * dishcloth 90yds / 82m c1 approx 50yds / 46m c2 approx 40yds / 36m * tea towel 385yds / 352m c1 approx 210yds / 192m c2 approx 175yds / 160m **recommended yarns ** * wecrochet dishie 2 * paintbox yarns cotton aran 3 * aran lion brand 24/7 cotton 4 * rico creative cotton aran 5 hook 4 5mm g-7 crochet hook 6 --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 7 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2023 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/free-crochet-dishcloth-patterns/ 2 https //shrsl com/4cok0 3 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/paintbox-yarns-cotton-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 4 https //lovecrafts com/en-us/p/lion-brand-24-7-cotton utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 5 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/rico-creative-cotton-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 6 https //shrsl com/3p74i 7 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
